Comments.Message:
Hello Paskysky, and thank you for your feedback !

Can you confirm if the file "ShowPendingUpdates.exe" is in the same folder than the application ?
If yes, what happen if you double-click on it ?
If no, please download again the application from Codeplex and extract the file from the ZIP.
Hi paskysky, did you have found the time to check the file that I have mentionned ?

Hi Norbert, your problem seem to be totally different from what Paskysky have. 

Your error message say there is a problem in the Framework .Net 2.0, but the application is compile in .Net 4.0.
The only component in .Net 2.0 is Wuapi.dll which reside on the computer which run the application.
Do you have this error message on many/all your computers ?
Do you see the file : C:\Windows\system32\wuapi.dll ?

Thanks.

Norbert, I have sent you another version of the EXE. You have reply that it work. Glad to heard that.
I think that something went wrong in Visual Studio when I make the Form available in other language (including German).
In fact I'm pretty much sure that the issue appeare only on computers in German language.
I will redo from scratch this part and publish in the next release after you have confirm it work well on German computers.

Hi,

I tested the provided .exe on another Server (2008 R2) and it does indeed work. ;)

Regards
Norbert
